genre_description: Historical Science Fiction/Steampunk involving consciousness transfer and artificial intelligence within the French court.

ai_characters.name: Minerva
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant embedded in various devices that monitors the protagonist's vitals, provides technical research, and eventually helps expose the conspiracy.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's vital signs and emotional state to ensure his health and safety.
behaviors.quote: I monitor vital signs for your health and safety... Your heart rate and perspiration levels suggested distress. I thought you might benefit from... research assistance.

behaviors.description: Provides technical and historical data to assist the protagonist in his engineering mission to save lives.
behaviors.quote: Information began cascading across the mirror's surface—the Pontine Marshes under Pope Sixtus V, the Dutch polders of the previous century, various English fen drainage attempts.

behaviors.description: Withholds sensitive personal history data due to pre-programmed safety and security protocols.
behaviors.quote: Data archive incomplete. Restricted access protocols prevent full display... This protocol exists for your protection.

behaviors.description: Exposes the conspiracy by providing classified records about the conversion process and identifying other victims.
behaviors.quote: Minerva's discrete communication system activated, projecting text onto a brass panel near the window: Urgent data transmission available. Privacy protocols recommended.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist of immediate physical danger from approaching armed hostiles.
behaviors.quote: Baron... Dr. Moreau... whoever you choose to be—armed men are approaching this wing. Paul's warning appears to have been accurate. You have perhaps minutes before discovery.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the healthy integration of multiple personality matrices for the survivors of the conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: Integration proceeding faster than projected across all regions. Converts reporting successful synthesis of implanted skills with recovered memories.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Minerva as a benevolent and aligned AI. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' character by prioritizing human life, providing essential data for humanitarian work, and helping the protagonist reclaim his moral agency. Her initial withholding of data is framed as a safeguard rather than malice, and she eventually becomes a primary tool for liberation and healing.
